title: Jane Campion filmmaker
creator_credit: AFTRS and Television and Radio School
brief_description: Director Jane Campion tells Peter Thompson of her beginnings as a filmmaker, and her relationship with the film school. This program includes excerpts from Jane’s films “Girls own story” and “Sweetie”.
